hibernate-mapping.query: select new GjkDto ( g.Kind, g.Description ) from LOMORM00008 as g where (g.Kind =: kind or g.Description =: description) and g.Active = true
select new GjkDto ( g.Kind, g.Description, g.Active, g.TS, g.CreatedUserId, g.CreatedDate, g.UpdatedUserId, g.UpdatedDate ) from LOMORM00008 as g where g.Active = true
update LOMORM00008 as g set g.Description = :desp, g.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, g.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where g.Kind=:kind and g.Active = true
select new GjkDto( g.Kind, g.Description, g.Active, g.TS, g.CreatedUserId, g.CreatedDate, g.UpdatedUserId, g.UpdatedDate ) from LOMORM00008 as g where g.Kind = :kind and g.Active = true
